field.description: ECTI Cb adaptive control. Small value of this regi

field.name: NX_HBLK_MIN_LINE_SUM
field.description: 0: Disable minimum line sum restriction 1-15: Set minimum line sum to 2^(nx_hblk_min_line_sum-1)

field.name: NX_VBLK_MIN_LINE_SUM
field.description: 0: Disable minimum line sum restriction 1-15: Set minimum line sum to 2^(nx_vblk_min_line_sum-1)

field.name: NX_MNR_EDGE_TH
field.description: Higher value for more strict edge qualification.

field.name: NX_MNR_GROUPING_STR
field.description: Higher value for more aggressive smoothing.

field.name: NR_IIR_MAX_WEI
field.description: Max IIR weighting when NL is 0

field.name: NR_IIR_MAX_WEI_E
field.description: Max IIR weighting when NL is greater than 8

field.name: NR_MOVINGTXR_SUB_WEI_NL_NAG_GAIN_DFT
field.description: noise level dependency gain to mcnr_movingtxr_sub_wei_base

field.name: MCNR_STILL_GMV_ASSIST_DE_PRTRBTN
field.description: enable gmv assist perturbation motion decision
